DOC.brief_summary: The study test hypothesis AccuCath™ System high rate successful first attempt PIV placement , high completion therapy , few complication , longer dwell time high user satisfaction compare Conventional IV Catheters .
DOC.brief_title: AccuCath™ Intravenous Catheter System Compared Conventional Peripheral Intravenous Catheters
DOC.detailed_description: Phase One design one arm prospective study compare patient use AccuCath™ Intravenous Catheter System result find literature . Phase Two design two arm prospective randomize control study compare AccuCath™ Intravenous Catheter System conventional PIV catheter . This study site complete Phase One .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female , age > equal 18 year < equal 89 year old ; 2 . Capable willing give inform consent ; 3 . English speaking ; 4 . Acceptable candidate elective , nonemergent PIV determine order physician ; 5 . Admitted study inpatient unit . 1 . Male female , < 18 year old > 89 year old ; 2 . Requirement emergent IV placement ( patient 's condition would compromise delay IV placement ) ; 3 . Previous venous graft surgery target vessel access site ; 4 . Currently involve investigational clinical trial ( unless permission grant study PI ) ; 5 . Females pregnant , plan become pregnant within 3 month procedure , lactate .
DOC.keyword: First Attempt Success Rate IV Catheters
